Text: no, hahalolmupp, I am not a subscriber to the guides.  I simply took this one out of the free trial area and replaced the actual guide with previously leaked ones.  According to Zygor forums this version includes some bug fixes to the viewer and a larger chain quest database.

It was said somewhere on his public forums that he posts his change log in the private section so that only actual subscribers know what changes.  And I was shocked the other day when I learned on wow.com that John Cook had someone else do it for him.  And all this time he impressed me with his skills...
It didn't come out as a file for me, it came out as a damn document. -_-
can someone make one for MAC please!
